com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.config

Class WorldConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.config.WorldConfig

  • public class WorldConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    World configuration settings. Gathers all the settings for a given world.
    Author:
    nitnelave

      • isAbove

        public boolean isAbove(org.bukkit.Location loc)
        Get whether the location is above the replace limit defined in this world, if height replacement is enabled.
        Parameters:
        loc - The location to test.
        Returns:
        Whether the location is above the limit, or true if height replacement is not enabled.

      • hasGriefProtection

        public boolean hasGriefProtection()
        Get whether any grief protection feature is enabled, thus requiring to listen to the grief events.
        Returns:
        Whether any grief protection is enabled.

      • isGriefBlackListed

        public boolean isGriefBlackListed(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Get whether the block is in the grief blackList (or not in the whitelist, if the whitelist is used).
        Parameters:
        block - The block to test.
        Returns:
        Whether the block is blacklisted.

      • getRepairTime

        public int getRepairTime()
        Get the time at which all repairs are automatically enforced.
        Returns:
        The time at which repairs are enforced, -1 if deactivated.

      • isBlackListed

        public boolean isBlackListed(BlockId id)
        Get whether a block is blacklisted for replacement (i.e. should not be replaced).
        Parameters:
        id - The blockId of the block.
        Returns:
        True if the block should not be blacklisted.
